New_Haven.Long Wharf (New Haven):
Long Wharf is a waterfront district and neighborhood of the city of New Haven, Connecticut, United States.


== Location ==
Its location can be defined as the area stretching inland from the west side of New Haven Harbor northwest to Union Avenue, west to Hallock Avenue and Cedar Street, and north to the Oak Street Connector and I-95 (up to the Q-Bridge). It is located directly south of downtown New Haven and the Wooster Square neighborhood.
